name: cafe-qr-platform-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Cafe QR Ordering Platform (NestJS API + Next.js Web)

scripts.dev: sh -c 'pnpm --filter ./apps/web run dev & PORT=4000 pnpm --filter ./apps/api run start:dev & wait'
scripts.build: pnpm --filter ./apps/web run build && pnpm --filter ./apps/api run build
scripts.start: sh -c 'pnpm --filter ./apps/web run start & PORT=4000 pnpm --filter ./apps/api run start & wait'
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && pnpm -r exec rimraf node_modules dist
